item.title: The United States and World Trade: Hegemony by Proxy?
item.description: Goldstein, Judith. “The United States and World Trade: Hegemony by Proxy?” In Strange Power: Shaping the Parameters of International Relations and International Political Economy, edited by Thomas Lawton, James Rosenau, Amy C. Verdun, 349-272. London: Routledge, 2000. Keywords: United States; Structural Power, Power; Trade Text access (external link)
